workspace.freeUserDesc: Access essential task management features. Create a single workspace/project and experience SaaS task flow with ads.
workspace.proUserDesc: Unlock workspace freedom—manage up to five workspaces with 5 projects each, 20 employees per project, no ads, and limited AI signals.
workspace.ultraUserDesc: Enterprise-grade automation: 10 workspaces, 20 projects each, 30 members, automatic scheduling, AI-driven guidance, and private cloud storage.
